mapper.insert: insert into member( m_id, m_pw, m_name, m_tel , m_area, m_field, m_regdate, m_rate , m_withdrawal, m_meetingauth, m_masterauth, m_point ) values( #{m_id}, #{m_pw}, #{m_name}, #{m_tel} , #{m_area}, #{m_field}, sysdate, 0 , 'N', 'N', 'N', 0 )
mapper.update: update member set m_pw = #{m_pw} where m_id = #{m_id}
mapper.insert: insert into reginfo( m_id, bt_num, bc_num, p_num ) values( #{m_id}, #{bt_num}, #{bc_num}, #{p_num} )
